title: DT Swiss blings out limited Oil Slick 240 hubs for shiny custom wheelbuilds
content:
DT Swiss 240 Oil Slick hubs jump on the shiny rainbow bandwagon with a limited edition version of their Classic MTB 240 EXP hubs, ready to be built up by your friendly neighborhood wheelbuilder. Limited both in number of actual hubs and limited options available, DT expects you to seek out a custom builder to […]

The post DT Swiss blings out limited Oil Slick 240 hubs for shiny custom wheelbuilds appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
